name: Poly Art - Low Poly Artbook
description:
Enjoy playing Jigsaw Puzzles? Crazy about Coloring Books? Put them together in a new Low Poly Art game. Poly… is an amusing puzzle game that sharpens your mind and help you relax at the same time.

You’re familiar with the rules:
- Drag a piece of low poly art to the right place that is shaped like the selected element;
- Continue filling in the playground area with puzzle pieces;
- Finish your puzzle and reveal a beautiful art.

Features:
- Huge collection of free puzzles;
- Different difficulty levels;
- Puzzles for adults and for kids;
- Various collections: flowers, mandalas, animals, people and many other;
- Daily challenges and therefore a sense of fulfilment when finished;
- Easy to save your works and share them with your family and friends;
- Hints that help you find a place for a piece;
- The app is free, no subscription needed, no hidden fees.

Create stunning pictures and achieve a state of creative meditation, while providing a fun activity that imparts a sense of accomplishment.
Low poly puzzles are a fun hobby that is also good for your brain. It builds great spatial reasoning and logic skills.

It’s easy to pass your leisure time in ways that benefit you. All you have to do is just sit back, relax and enjoy our free poly art puzzle app.

Completing fascinating low poly puzzles is a powerful tool that allows you to block out the negativity in your life and the world. Whenever you are tired, bored, or just want to get good stress relief, play our puzzle game. It’s very relaxing and awesome at helping to clear your mind.

Let go of your worries and get into artistic mood with PolyArt puzzle game!
